# selectedIndex

**Instance Property**

The index of the selected item in the scrubber.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var selectedIndex: Int { get set }
```

## Discussion

If no item is selected, the value of this property is `-1`. If you set this property through the scrubber’s animator proxy, the selection change animates.

To use a scrubber’s animator proxy when changing the selected item, employ the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSAnimatablePropertyContainer] protocol, using code like this: `scrubber.animator.selectedIndex = 123`

## Getting the state of the scrubber

- **numberOfItems**: The number of items represented by the scrubber.
- **highlightedIndex**: The index of the highlighted item in the scrubber.
